Header: ‘Ata Pattama’ bags award for most popular TV program for the 11th consecutive time
Content: Dr. Hasantha Hettiarachchi’s ‘Ata Pattama’ magazine program aired over the ITN bagged the award for most popular television program at the Slim Nielsen Awards for the 11th consecutive time. Dr. Hasantha Hettiarachchi was also nominated as the most popular presenter at the Slim Nielsen people’s awards ceremony. He serves as the Manager of Programs of the ITN media network and his outstanding program of ‘Ata Pattama’ has earned fame not only in Sri Lanka but also among expatriates in foreign countries.
